Led Pipe.desc: A sturdy pipe. You never know when you might need it.

Dark dice.desc: Do I feel lucky? Well, do I?

Cheese.desc: No one has as many friends as the man with many cheeses.

Pack of Smokes.desc: An old, musty pack of cigarettes.

Holy Book.desc: A holy book with a religious symbol on the cover. Written by King Games

Bloody Note.desc: A crumpled, bloody note with a strange script on it.

Severed finger.desc: A cold, hard finger. From the looks of it, it used to belong to a woman.

Strange Book.desc: A leather-bound old book with a strange symbol on the front.
